name: Green City Initiative
description: The Green City Initiative aims to make the urban environment more sustainable by increasing green spaces, promoting eco-friendly practices, and enhancing biodiversity. This includes planting trees, creating urban gardens, and implementing green roofs and walls to reduce the heat island effect

description: The Urban Renewal Project focuses on revitalizing neglected or underdeveloped areas within the city. It includes renovating buildings, improving infrastructure, and creating mixed-use developments that combine residential, commercial, and recreational spaces to boost economic growth and community engagement.
